articles.title: Oxford criminologist 'outraged' by NZ women's prisons - RNZ
articles.description: An expert on America's 'supermax' jails says the way women are treated in New Zealand prisons is "extremely troubling".
articles.content:
The use of pepper spray should be banned in women's prisons, according to a criminologist at Oxford University in England, who says she is outraged at the treatment of women in New Zealand jails.

articles.title: Duncan Wanblad named new Anglo American CEO as Cutifani to step down after 9 years at the helm - News24
articles.description: Anglo American has appointed Duncan Wanblad to lead the company after Mark Cutifani's retirement in 2022.
articles.content:
